B

BezierPoint - Class in graphicslib3D
This class is a helper class supporting the SurfacePatchDialog; it is not intended to be used directly.
BezierPoint() - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.BezierPoint
Base constructor; all coordinates are initialized to 0, and the point size is set to 8 pixels in length.
BezierPoint(double, double, double) - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.BezierPoint
First overloaded constructor; both origin and location coordinates are set to the same passed values.

C

CameraSettingsDialog - Class in graphicslib3D
This class provides a graphical component for keeping track of camera setting values (location, look-at point, and up-direction) interactively.

Creates a CameraSettingsDialog for the specified frame.

contains(Point) - Method in class graphicslib3D.BezierPoint

ControlMesh - Class in graphicslib3D
This class defines a 4x4 array of "control points" -- Point3D objects which represent the control points for a cubic Bezier surface.
ControlMesh() - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.ControlMesh
Creates a control point array with default control point values.

GLSLUtils - Class in graphicslib3D
This class defines a set of static utility methods useful when manipulating GLSL shader programs in a JOGL OpenGL environment, including routines to read shader source from a file, fetch and print shader and shader program information logs, and check for OpenGL errors.
GLSLUtils() - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.GLSLUtils
 
graphicslib3D - package graphicslib3D
 

I

insertVertex(Vertex3D) - Method in class graphicslib3D.Polygon3D
Creates a copy of the specified Vertex3D object and inserts the new Vertex3D at the head of the vertex list of this Polygon3D.
insertVertex(Point3D) - Method in class graphicslib3D.Polygon3D
Uses the specified Point3D to create a new Vertex3D object and inserts the Vertex3D at the head of the vertex list of this Polygon3D.
IQuarterPatch - Interface in graphicslib3D
This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by classes in order to be editable by the "QuarterPatchDialog" class.
ISurfacePatch - Interface in graphicslib3D
This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by classes in order to be editable by the "SurfacePatchDialog" class.

Polygon3D - Class in graphicslib3D
Defines a 3D polygon which includes a Vertex list and Plane Coefficients.
Polygon3D() - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.Polygon3D
Creates a polygon with an empty vertex list and plane coefficients whose values are all zero.
printOpenGLError(GLAutoDrawable) - Static method in class graphicslib3D.GLSLUtils
Prints a message describing any OpenGL errors which have occurred.
printProgramInfoLog(GLAutoDrawable, int) - Static method in class graphicslib3D.GLSLUtils
Fetches and prints the Program Information Log for the GLSL shader program specified by parameter "program", which must be a legal GLSL program object ID.
printShaderInfoLog(GLAutoDrawable, int) - Static method in class graphicslib3D.GLSLUtils
Fetches and prints the Shader Information Log for the GLSL shader specified by parameter "shader", which must be a legal shader object ID.
printShaderSource(String[]) - Static method in class graphicslib3D.GLSLUtils
Prints the set of lines contained in the specified array, which is assumed to be a GLSL shader program with each line terminated with an appropriate line terminator.

Q

QuarterPatchDialog - Class in graphicslib3D
This class is an editor which provides a graphical interface for making changes to the properties of IQuarterPatch objects -- i.e., any object which implements the "IQuarterPatch" interface.
QuarterPatchDialog(Frame) - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.QuarterPatchDialog
Constructs a default instance of the QuarterPatchDialog editor, saving the specified Frame (for example, a JFrame) as the parent (owner) of the dialog.
QuarterPatchDialogPanel - Class in graphicslib3D
This helper class implements the visual functionality of the QuarterPatchDialog class by providing mouse listeners, painting algorithms, and methods to manually move a point via scrollbars or textboxes.
QuarterPatchDialogPanel(QuarterPatchDialog, int, int) - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.QuarterPatchDialogPanel
Base constructor- all camera default values are initialized here.
QuarterPatchLimitsDialog - Class in graphicslib3D
This helper class provides a dialog for updating point limits in swept QuarterPatches being edited with a QuarterPatchDialog.
QuarterPatchLimitsDialog(QuarterPatchDialog) - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.QuarterPatchLimitsDialog
Base constructor- all textFields and JPanels are initialized here.

R

readShaderSource(String) - Static method in class graphicslib3D.GLSLUtils
Reads the specified text file and returns an array of strings where each string contains one line of text from the file.

Forces repaint of sweptPatchDialogPanel.
refreshView() - Method in class graphicslib3D.SurfacePatchDialogPanel
Forces repaint of surfaceDialogPanel.
resetCameraSettings() - Method in class graphicslib3D.CameraSettingsDialog
Resets the camera parameters in the dialog to their default values.
resetPoint(Matrix3D) - Method in class graphicslib3D.BezierPoint
Resets the point to its original values before the point was moved by the mouse (an undo operation).
resetPoint() - Method in class graphicslib3D.BezierPoint
Overloaded method that resets the point to its original x and y values only (a 2D undo operation).

SurfacePatchDialog - Class in graphicslib3D
This class is an editor which provides a graphical interface for making changes to the properties of ISurfacePatch objects -- i.e., any object which implements the "ISurfacePatch" interface.
SurfacePatchDialog(Frame) - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.SurfacePatchDialog
Constructs a default instance of the SurfacePatchDialog editor, saving the specified Frame (for example, a JFrame) as the parent (owner) of the dialog.
SurfacePatchDialogPanel - Class in graphicslib3D
This helper class implements the visual functionality of the SurfacePatchDialog class by providing mouse listeners, painting algorithms, and methods to manually move a point via scrollbars or textboxes.
SurfacePatchDialogPanel(SurfacePatchDialog, int, int) - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.SurfacePatchDialogPanel
Base constructor- all camera default values are initialized here.
SurfacePatchLimitsDialog - Class in graphicslib3D
This helper class provides a dialog for updating point limits in SurfacePatches being edited by a SurfacePatchDialog editor.
SurfacePatchLimitsDialog(SurfacePatchDialog) - Constructor for class graphicslib3D.SurfacePatchLimitsDialog
Base constructor- all textFields and JPanels are initialized here.
